name: Mobile / RAN Telecom engineer
description:
Обязанности:

- Subject Matter expert on Wireless Network Architecture and components

- Present to the Customer the TEOCO solution concept and capabilities

- Work closely with customers, providing them online and onsite technical support with root cause analysis.

- Optimize network performance for the various deployments of our customers.

- Deep understanding of TEOCO solution, feature behavior, and the different parameters that tune the behavior of our product.

- Work with product management, pre-sale, feature architects and developers.

- Perform telco analytics, Performance analysis, competitive analysis, tests and recommend accordingly.

- Knowledge source for 4G and 5G standards.

- Leveraging ML and analytics tools to enhance and operationalize network monitoring

Требования:
  • At least 3 years working in a telecom operator (such as, Partner, Cellcom, PHI) as Performance analysis, NOC, Network Support, or Operations Engineer with experience of trouble shooting. OR At least 3 years of experience working for a large vendor (e.g. Ericsson, Nokia…) in one of the following positions in this order: field support engineer, performance analysis and similar
  • Knowledgeable in Radio Access Networks and\or mobile core networks.
  • Knowledgeable in the following areas: (as many as possible) : UMTS,LTE, VoLTE, 5G Mobile backhaul
  • Advance: experience in one of the following protocols: EUTRAN,NG-RAN
  • Knowledgeable in the following xDR protocols: SIP, ISUP, MAP, CAP, GnGp, Diamater.
  • Must: experience with analysis of performance measurements (OM), KPIs and/or alarms (on NSS & BSS levels), xDRs
  • Capable of dealing with urgent customers issues in a multi-tasking mod
  • Advance: experience in working with international customers
  • Advance: experience with IBM Netcool, HP TeMIP, Netscout, Astelia, QlickView OSS and analytic systems.
  • Advantage: Experience in Analytics methods , data analysis , SQL
  • Must: English in a high level
  • Readiness to travel abroad 20%

key_skills.name: SIP, ISUP, MAP, CAP, GnGp, Diamater
